title: Bug 6147Templates don't work in "Show source of selected element only" mode
description: Bug 6147Templates don't work in "Show source of selected element only" modeTemplate variables do not work correctly when the editor is in "Show source of selected element only" mode.
OB: It appears that edits in the active variable fields are misinterpreted as being in a different place in the file (presumably because the indexing is 'zoomed' for the selected element).This leads to the changes to variables being ignored, or the cursor jumping into the body of the template (and switching off the active variable fields).
